snippet: Sam Mikulak ran away with the United States men’s gymnastics championship in Hartford, winning the all-around title over Alex Naddour.
abstract: Sam Mikulak, two-time NCAA champion for University of Michigan, runs away with United States men’s gymnastics championship in Hartford, winning the all-around title.
lead_paragraph: Sam Mikulak ran away with the United States men’s gymnastics championship in Hartford, winning the all-around title over Alex Naddour.

headline.main: Wolverines Standout Coasts to U.S. Gymnastics Title
headline.print_headline: Wolverines Standout Coasts to U.S. Title
